content:
Default Referencing Behavior: 4 Cases

  • Redirect References

  • Collections That Contain Redirect References

  • Direct References

  • Collections That Contain Direct References

Previous slide Next slide Back to first slide View graphic version

Notes:

    For each method, we have to define default behavior for these 4 cases.
    So far, we NEVER violate this rule: the default behavior for a reference is the same as the default behavior when a reference is encountered while processing a method for a collection.
